description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. Join a friend in Acid Rain Heroes, the sequel to Acid Rain.  Featuring 2 Player co-op and auto switching split screen.  A survival action adventure with 13 story and 3 challenge missions. A volcano erupts, raining fiery destruction! People are in peril, trapped in the valley by acid rain and volcanic rocks, seeking refuge in the forest and caves. Will you lead the rescue effort and become a hero?
